title: Express Talk: Global Modernism—Kazimir Malevich
hero_caption: <p>Kazimir Malevich, <em>Painterly Realism of a Football Player - Color Masses in the 4th Dimension</em>, summer/fall 1915. Through prior gifts of Charles H. and M …
description:
Modernism affected artistic production in different ways but on a global scale. Join Jill Bugajski of the department of Academic Engagement and Research to unpack Russian artist Kazimir Malevich’s expression of modern ideas and form.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
